name: Mummy contact
description:
One of the tombs was spoiled. The time of awakening the mummy, which serves as a guardian and has only one goal, is to return all the treasures back.

Mummy contact is a side-view indirect control platformer that has to guide the mummy through safe paths while avoiding traps. Take mines, bayonets out of the way, push bridges apart so that your assistant doesn’t fall into the abyss and can collect all the jewels scattered on the ground.

Features:
-Pixel Graphics
-Attractive gameplay
-30 levels
